name: Environment Files & API Keys Scanner
description: Comprehensive scanner for exposed configuration files, environment files, and 80+ API key/secret patterns including AWS, GCP, Azure, GitHub, GitLab, Slack, Stripe, and more
author: Dominator Team
remediation: Never commit .env files to version control. Use environment variables or secret management services (AWS Secrets Manager, Azure Key Vault, HashiCorp Vault). Add .env to .gitignore. Rotate all exposed keys immediately. Use pre-commit hooks to prevent secret commits.
